Dear Mr/Ms. [Hiring Manager's Last-Name],

I would like to introduce myself as an experienced Shift Technician who is looking to take on a new challenge and is keen to apply for the position that your company recently advertised on the Profyl.ORG website.

I am the kind of person who loves to get under the skin of a problem and can't rest until it's been solved right down to the root cause.

For the last two years, I have been working for [Previous Company], where I have been primarily responsible for the safe and efficient operation of a plant over a 24-hour shift rotation period. I carry out a wide range of important duties and supervise the work of three junior personnel. While carrying out my work duties, I always keep my work area and protective clothing clean, tidy, and in a safe condition to uphold the Manufacturer's and Company’s image.

Apart from my high degree of technical knowledge, I am also someone who is hardworking by nature, with good planning, preparation, organizational, and administrative skills along with a keen eye for detail. In addition to this, I work well under pressure to agreed deadlines and am receptive to new ideas and initiatives.

I must also mention that I thrive on pressurized situations and have a calm and mature disposition that helps me deal with the most stressful of situations. Furthermore, as a true professional, I am always on the lookout to improve the ways systems and processes work.

Right now, I would like to work for an exciting company like yours that uses smart people and smart technology to deliver its vision.

I would very much like the chance to meet with you in person and hope that you will look favorably on my application and invite me for an interview.

Thank you very much for taking the time to consider my application.

Sincerely,
